name: Victor Ionescu
bio:
Victor Ionescu is the Co-Founder and Chief Technology Officer of Hashflow, a decentralized exchange designed for users to trade seamlessly across chains while offering zero slippage, improved pricing, and MEV-protection. Victor is a software veteran in Silicon Valley with a background in Big Tech and S1 filing. He previously led large-scale systems infrastructure projects and managed cross-functional teams at Airbnb, Facebook, and Google.

Victor strengthened his passions for coding and financial world while studying at the University of Oxford where he graduated with a B.S. in Mathematics & Computer Science.
